mean_cn: n.（烹调的）原料；（构成的）要素
mean_en: one of the things from which something is made, especially one of the foods that are used together to make a particular dish
sentence: Flour is the main ingredient of bread.
sentence_trans: 面粉是面包的主要原料。
word_etyma: in进入 + gred走 + ient → 走进去的，成为其中一部分 → ingredient成份，因素
